original_text: We have these little troubles that continue for a short time. But as a result, we will receive the great things that God has prepared for us. Those great things are much more important than our little troubles. And God's great things will continue for ever!
korean_text: 우리가 잠시 받는 환난의 경한 것이 지극히 크고 영원한 영광의 중한 것을 우리에게 이루게 함이니

sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 이 작은 고난을 가지고 있습니다

sentences.original_text: that continue for a short time
we will receive the great things
that God has prepared for us
Those great things are much more important
sentences.korean_translation: 그 위대한 것들은 훨씬 더 중요합니다

sentences.original_text: And God's great things will continue for ever
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 하나님의 위대한 것들은 영원히 계속될 것입니다
